name: cleverbrush-framework
description: Cleverbrush Framework - a set of libraries used by Cleverbrush, a web-based publishing application

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build_async && npm run build_deep && npm run build_knex-clickhouse && npm run build_schema && npm run build_scheduler
scripts.build_async:beta: cd libs/async && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build_deep:beta: cd libs/deep && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build_knex-clickhouse:beta: cd libs/knex-clickhouse && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build_schema:beta: cd libs/schema && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build_scheduler:beta: cd libs/scheduler && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.clean: npm run clean_async && npm run clean_deep && npm run clean_knex-clickhouse && npm run clean_schema && npm run clean_scheduler
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/schema --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/deep --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/knex-clickhouse --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/async --access=public && npm publish --workspace @cleverbrush/scheduler --access=public
scripts.publish:beta: npm run clean && npm run build_deep:beta && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/deep --access=public && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/knex-clickhouse --access=public && npm run build_async:beta && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/async --access=public && npm run build_schema:beta && npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/schema --access=public && npm run build_scheduler:beta &&  npm publish --tag beta --workspace @cleverbrush/scheduler --access=public

author: Andrew Zolotukhin <andrew_zol@cleverbrush.com>
